dialogue.introduction: Second light cruiser of the Agano-class, Noshiro, has arrived. Glad to meet you!
dialogue.library_intro: 2nd of the newly-developed Agano-class Light Cruisers, Noshiro. The lone aircraft rail is my charmpoint. Even in Leyte Gulf, I did my best as a main member of Kurita's task force!
dialogue.secretary1: Yes Admiral! Did you call for Noshiro?
dialogue.secretary2: Yes! Let's get the work done promptly and efficiently!
dialogue.secretary3: Geez, Agano-nee! Stop stroking my thighs!... Huh? ...Admiral? My apologies for being rude!... H-huh? Huh?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Um... Did the Admiral forget about Noshiro? It's not like taking care of Agano-nee is the only thing on my mind...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, just one more push. Come on! Admiral, erm... have you see Agano-nee... eh!? Admiral, aren't you exhausted? You look terrible. That's no good, stay right there! Wait, and I'll bring the medicine!
dialogue.wedding: "Admiral, sorry to bother you at such a busy time. There's something that I've wanted to say to you… Everyone thinks that I just want to care for Agano-nee, but I… I really… want to care for the Admiral… I think… Really!? This is like a dream! Admiral! Noshiro will do her best!"
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Roger. Light cruiser Noshiro, setting off.
dialogue.equipment1: This is... many thanks! Noshiro will not sink!
dialogue.equipment3: Is Agano-nee going to be okay with this?
dialogue.expedition_selection: Is Agano-nee going to be okay with this?
dialogue.resource_collection: Is Agano-nee going to be okay with this?
dialogue.instant_repair: Is Agano-nee going to be okay with this?
dialogue.development: Is Agano-nee going to be okay with this?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Noshiro will take a small break.
dialogue.docking_complete: Admiral, reporting a repair is complete.
dialogue.ship_construction: Admiral! A report of completed construction.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Second torpedo squadron flagship, Noshiro. Setting sail.
dialogue.battle_start: Starting the naval battle. I'll leave the formation to you.
dialogue.attack: How unfortunate, this is already in our hands! Fire!
dialogue.night_attack: Remaining shells is sufficient! All fire!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Remaining shells is sufficient! All fire!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Remaining shells is sufficient! All fire!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Remaining shells is sufficient! All fire!
dialogue.mvp: Noshiro was the best during this battle? Well, I'm an Agano-class, so it's only natural... But, I'm glad, you know.
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Gehh... I can still keep going!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: This is nothing compared to Sibuyan island!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Ku.... Even if you say that, I'm still a light cruiser... B-but, I'm not sunk yet... I can still fire!
dialogue.sunk: Again, Noshiro has sunk, huh.... Agano-nee, will you take it easy this time...? Okay...?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Agano-nee don't just loiter underneath the kotatsu! You'll get fat! Stand up, stand up! How about going to practice and coming back?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: *Sigh* I've to clean up the Admiral's desk as well... and I really want to sort out the storehouse after that too... Ah, Agano-nee. What am I doing? Spring cleaning of course, spring cleaning.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! Please take good care of the Agano-class this year, too. Noshiro will keep doing her best!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Ok, Agano-nee. Throw these beans. Demons out! ...like that. Ah, that way is-! ...ah, aah~. U-Um, Yahagi? Well, you see...

hourly.0000: It's 0 o'clock at night. Timekeeping, is it like this?
hourly.0100: It's 1 o'clock at night. Admiral's room has this kind of taste... Ah, I didn't mean it in that way
hourly.0200: It's 2 o'clock at night. If you're going to be up anyway, how about redecorating the office?
hourly.0300: It's 3 o'clock at night. Are you not tired? This is so different from training with Agano-nee!
hourly.0400: It's 4 A.M. No matter when an enemy attacks, Noshiro is always ready to go!
hourly.0500: 5 A.M. We, the shipdaughters, no matter what the time... Eh? The other shipdaughers are... asleep?
hourly.0600: 6 A.M. Today's dailies are done? Ah, as expected from the Admiral!
hourly.0700: It's 7 A.M, huh. Isn't it about time for Breakfast? Agano-nee's making it, so let's go eat together!
hourly.0800: It's 8 A.M. Admiral, let's do our best today too!
hourly.0900: 9 A.M. Admiral! This morning variety show, it's pretty interesting, right?
hourly.1000: 10 A.M. As a flagship, Noshiro will provide the ingredients for the Admiral's lunch!
hourly.1100: 11 A.M. The ingredients have been gathers. Onion, potato, carrot, and...
hourly.1200: It's just on lunch! Well, I'll serve up some Noshiro Curry! It's Agano-nee's favourite!
hourly.1300: It's 1 P.M. Ah, I was found out, huh. The truth is, Noshiro can't cook anything except curry.
hourly.1400: It's 2 P.M. I'll clean up after lunch... Ah, I have to clear up after Agano-nee's too...
hourly.1500: It's 3 P.M. Sorry Admiral, I made Agano-nee a promise, so I'll be heading off for a bit.
hourly.1600: It's 4 P.M. Even though I waited at the meeting spot for an hour... yeah...
hourly.1700: It's 5 P.M. Agano-nee forgot about the promise... Well, she does that often...
hourly.1800: It's 6 P.M. Agano-nee, after an earnest apology, invited me to dinner. Well, it can't be helped, you know?
hourly.1900: It's 7 P.M. I'm going to head off, but I'll prepare tonight's curry in advance.
hourly.2000: It's' 8 P.M, well then, see you later!
hourly.2100: 9 P.M. I'm back. A dinner between sisters is nice to do sometimes, yeah?
hourly.2200: It's 10 P.M. Admiral, are you night battling tonight as well? Doing all-nighters all the time is bad for your health.
hourly.2300: 11 P.M. Noshiro expresses the opinion that you should go to sleep earlier.
